text: Anna Elisabeth de Bruijn (1 January 1920 â€“ 3 October 2018), better known by the stage name of Elisabeth Andersen, was a Dutch theatre actress. She was born in The Hague. She was a three-time winner of the Theo d'Or. Andersen was known for her work with .
